movies.title: Les Leningrad Cowboys rencontrent Moïse
movies.plot: The Cowboys are lured from Mexico to Coney Island by their former manager who disappeared at the end of Leningrad Cowboys Go America. He believes he is the reincarnation of Moses, sent to lead them back to the promised land - Siberia.
movies.simplePlot: The Cowboys are lured from Mexico to Coney Island by their former manager who disappeared at the end of Leningrad Cowboys Go America. He believes he is the reincarnation of Moses, sent to lead them back to the promised land - Siberia.

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Twist-Twist Erkinharju yet.
biography.name: Twist-Twist Erkinharju

biography.bio: Ben Granfelt is known for his work on Les Leningrad Cowboys rencontrent Moïse (1994), Trabant express (1996) and Heavy Metal (2007).
biography.name: Ben Granfelt

biography.bio: Sakke Järvenpää was born as Sakari Järvenpää. He is an actor and art director, known for Leningrad Cowboys Go America (1989), Zombie et le train fantôme (1991) and Les Leningrad Cowboys rencontrent Moïse (1994).
biography.name: Sakke Järvenpää

biography.bio: Jore Marjaranta was born as Jorma Marjaranta.
biography.name: Jore Marjaranta

biography.bio: Ekke Niiva is known for his work on Les Leningrad Cowboys rencontrent Moïse (1994), Viemäri-tv (1989) and Kiss Me in the Rain (1999).
biography.name: Ekke Niiva

biography.bio: Jyri Närvänen is known for his work on Zombie et le train fantôme (1991), Les Leningrad Cowboys rencontrent Moïse (1994) and Viemäri-tv (1989).
biography.name: Jyri Närvänen

biography.bio: Pemo Ojala is known for his work on Ken tulta pyytää (2001), Les Leningrad Cowboys rencontrent Moïse (1994) and Kiss Me in the Rain (1999).
biography.name: Pemo Ojala

biography.bio: Silu Seppälä was born as Antti Juhani Seppälä. He is known for his work on Zombie et le train fantôme (1991), The Match Factory Girl (1990) and Rocky VI (1986).
biography.name: Silu Seppälä

biography.bio: Mauri Sumén was born on October 2, 1965 in Lappeenranta, Finland as Mauri Juhani Sumén. He is known for his work on Leningrad Cowboys Go America (1989), Trench Road (2004) and Les Leningrad Cowboys rencontrent Moïse (1994).
biography.name: Mauri Sumén

biography.bio: Mato Valtonen was born on February 21, 1955 in Loimaa, Finland as Markku Juhani Valtonen. He is an actor and writer, known for Leningrad Cowboys Go America (1989), Rocky VI (1986) and Les Leningrad Cowboys rencontrent Moïse (1994).
biography.name: Mato Valtonen

biography.bio: Matti Pellonpää was born on March 28, 1951 in Helsinki, Finland as Matti Kalervo Pellonpää. He was an actor, known for La Vie de Bohème (1992), Leningrad Cowboys Go America (1989) and Shadows in Paradise (1986). He died on July 13, 1995 in Vaasa, Finland.
biography.name: Matti Pellonpää

biography.bio: Kari Väänänen was born on September 17, 1953 in Ivalo, Finland as Kari Kyösti Väänänen. He is an actor and writer, known for Taivaan tulet (2007), Drifting Clouds (1996) and Leningrad Cowboys Go America (1989). He is married to Terhi Väänänen. They have one child. He was previously married to Sanna Fransman and Susanna Roine.
biography.name: Kari Väänänen

biography.bio: André Wilms was born on April 29, 1947 in Strasbourg, Bas-Rhin, France. He is an actor, known for Le Havre (2011), Monsieur Hire (1989) and La Vie de Bohème (1992).
biography.name: André Wilms

biography.bio: Jacques Blanc is an actor and producer, known for Les Leningrad Cowboys rencontrent Moïse (1994) and Dans un miroir (1986).
biography.name: Jacques Blanc

laboratory: DuArt Film Laboratories Inc., New York, USA
